Author: Ritesh.Modi
Summary: This runbook creates a new Affinity Group representing a location.    This runbook needs a valid Azure Location name to create the Affinity group. There are few valid locations like East US, East Asia and others and any one from them must be used as parameter.    It checks if
Title: Creates a New Azure Affinity Group
